{"post_stream":{"posts":[{"id":3326394,"name":"Vincent","username":"luckvs","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/luckvs/{size}/191828_2.png","created_at":"2024-03-07T01:32:45.486Z","cooked":"

Hello,
This is a second post of this which has more info on it, but we have resolved some issues over time.
We have replaced all the broken motors and encoders, everything works now. We have all 8 motors, all 8 encoders, and the gyro working.
-Things to note: the gyro drifts, we are unsure of how the whole PID system works, and we are unsure if the
We are using TalonSRX’s for all 8 drive motors. We are using am-2816a for turning encoders, and we are using m-3314a for drive encoders, and we are sure that our EncoderCPR, EncoderWheelRadius, and EncoderWheelDiameter are correct, but are unsure about the MaxSpeed and MaxAngularSpeed stuff. We are also unsure if the units we are receiving from the encoder are the correct units we are passing to the swerve drive.
Like states before, we are using Andymark Swerve&Steer motors.
The actual issue here is the wheels are not reacting properly to the xbox controller axes, and the turning motors randomly spin when there is no inputs from the controller.
Our code is here, and important files are Constants.h (set values for encoders), SwerveModule.cpp/.h, Drivetrain.ccp/.h, and Robot.h (we have our drive stuff in Robot.h)
Thanks
